## serialization.procedures.ProcedureSerializer class

Serializer for saving and loading procedure state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ProcedureSerializer<ProcedureModel extends IProcedureModel, ParameterModel extends IParameterModel> implements ISerializer 
```
**Implements:** [ISerializer](./blockly.serialization.iserializer.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.procedures.procedureserializer.clear.md) |  | Disposes of any procedure models that exist on the workspace. |
|  [load(state, workspace)](./blockly.serialization.procedures.procedureserializer.load.md) |  | Deserializes the procedures models defined by the given state into the workspace. |
|  [save(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.procedures.procedureserializer.save.md) |  | Serializes the procedure models of the given workspace. |
